name: My New Secretary is a Futanari [XXX Complete Minigame)
name_original: My New Secretary is a Futanari [XXX Complete Minigame)
description: The user plays the game as the CEO of a fashion company. Your trustworthy secretary, has to leave her employment, so You are in search for a valuable substitute. The chosen candidate Is a beautiful girl, she's smart, she's gorgeous, but she also have some "hidden features"that you will discover through the game.
